name: Apastron
description:
Gameplay:

  • 50+ Guns to (Find / Purchase / Loot / Earn)
  • First person controls with sliding and automatic climbing / vaulting mechanics.
  • Double Jump
  • Light sword Melee



    Story :
    You're a defender reborn every generation. Your overseer the Apastron restores you (Phoebe Harper) to discover the plot against the drowning planet Coelho. The last Metropolis on the planet Central 98 is being occupied by the Forever Corporation. Phoebe must use her last granted life to correct the mistakes of her past, and save Coelho in the process.
